text: Alloh taolo mefarmojad: "Imruz ruzest, ki rostii rostgujon ʙa onon sud meʙaxsad. Onon ʙoƣhoe [dar ʙihist] dorand, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast va to aʙad covidona dar on memonand. Alloh taolo az [a'moli] onon xusnud ast va onon [niz] az [podosi] U xusnudand. In hamon rastagorii ʙuzurg ast
